Title: Pinwheels and Whirligigs
Plot: Nancy decides that her family has seen enough gunslinging for a lifetime, so to lighten things up she takes them to a Montana fair. Andy and Silas enter a butter-eating contest while Doug looks after the baby and makes friends with the carneys. Elsewhere, Nancy escorts Shane on a rollercoaster where they stir up some trouble in line.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes
